mapper.insert: insert into tb_edoc_REF ( ED_NO ,USER_ID ,REG_DATE ,MOD_DATE ,REG_ID ,MOD_ID ,DEL_YN )VALUES( 'LI' || '-' || (SELECT SUBSTR(EF.ED_FR_NAME, 1, 2) FROM TB_EDOC_FORM EF WHERE EF.ED_FR_CODE = #{edFormCode} AND ROWNUM = 1) || '-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || SEQ_EDOC.CURRVAL ,#{userId} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE , #{regId} , #{modId} , 'N' )

insert into tb_edoc_hist ( USER_ID ,ED_NO ,REG_DATE ,MOD_DATE ,REG_ID ,MOD_ID ,DEL_YN )VALUES( #{userId} ,'LI' || '-' || (SELECT SUBSTR(EF.ED_FR_NAME, 1, 2) FROM TB_EDOC_FORM EF WHERE EF.ED_FR_CODE = #{edFormCode} AND ROWNUM = 1) || '-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || SEQ_EDOC.CURRVAL ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE , #{regId} , #{modId} , 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ED.ED_NO , ED.ED_TITLE , M.USER_NAME AS REG_ID , ED.MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(ED.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE , EF.ED_FR_NAME AS ED_FORM_CODE , DECODE(ED.STATUS, '01', '대기', '02', '예정', '03', '확인', '04', '진행') AS STATUS , ED.REG_DATE FROM TB_EDOC ED JOIN TB_EDOC_FORM EF ON (ED_FR_CODE = ED_FORM_CODE) JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (ED.REG_ID = M.USER_ID) JOIN TB_EDOC_HIST EH ON (ED.REG_ID = EH.REG_ID) WHERE ED.DEL_YN = 'N' AND ED.REG_ID = #{userId} OR EH.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY ED.REG_DATE

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ED.ED_NO , ED.ED_TITLE , M.USER_NAME AS REG_ID , ED.MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(ED.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE , EF.ED_FR_NAME AS ED_FORM_CODE , DECODE(ED.STATUS, '01', '대기', '02', '예정', '03', '확인', '04', '진행') AS STATUS , ED.REG_DATE FROM TB_EDOC ED JOIN TB_EDOC_FORM EF ON (ED.ED_FORM_CODE = EF.ED_FR_CODE) JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (ED.REG_ID = M.USER_ID) JOIN TB_EDOC_HIST EH ON (ED.REG_ID = EH.REG_ID) WHERE ED.DEL_YN = 'N' AND (ED.REG_ID = #{userId} OR EH.USER_ID = #{userId}) ORDER BY ED.REG_DATE ) COUNT

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ED.ED_NO , ED.ED_TITLE , M.USER_NAME AS REG_ID , ED.MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(ED.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE , EF.ED_FR_NAME AS ED_FORM_CODE , DECODE(ED.STATUS, '01', '대기', '02', '예정', '03', '확인', '04', '진행') AS STATUS , ED.REG_DATE FROM TB_EDOC ED JOIN TB_EDOC_FORM EF ON (ED.ED_FORM_CODE = EF.ED_FR_CODE) JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (ED.REG_ID = M.USER_ID) JOIN TB_EDOC_HIST EH ON (ED.REG_ID = EH.REG_ID) WHERE ED.DEL_YN = 'N' AND (ED.REG_ID = #{userId} OR EH.USER_ID = #{userId}) AND ED.STATUS = #{condition} AND ED.ED_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY ED.REG_DATE ) COUNT

SELECT DISTINCT ED.ED_NO , ED.ED_TITLE , M.USER_NAME AS REG_ID , ED.MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(ED.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE , EF.ED_FR_NAME AS ED_FORM_CODE , DECODE(ED.STATUS, '01', '대기', '02', '예정', '03', '확인', '04', '진행') AS STATUS , ED.REG_DATE FROM TB_EDOC ED JOIN TB_EDOC_FORM EF ON (ED_FR_CODE = ED_FORM_CODE) JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (ED.REG_ID = M.USER_ID) JOIN TB_EDOC_HIST EH ON (ED.REG_ID = EH.REG_ID) WHERE ED.DEL_YN = 'N' AND (ED.REG_ID = #{userId} OR EH.USER_ID = #{userId}) AND ED.STATUS = #{condition} AND ED.ED_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY ED.REG_DATE

SELECT ED_FR_NAME , ED_NO , D.DEPT_TITLE , M.USER_NAME AS REG_ID , ED.PRES_DATE , ED.SEC_CODE , ED.ED_TITLE , ED_CONTENT FROM TB_EDOC ED JOIN TB_EDOC_FORM EF ON (ED.ED_FORM_CODE = EF.ED_FR_CODE) JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (M.USER_ID = ED.REG_ID) JOIN TB_DEPT D ON (M.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE) WHERE ED.ED_NO = #{edNo}

SELECT EH.USER_ID , M.USER_NAME , M.SIGN_URL , EH.ED_NO , EH.ED_HIST_ORDER , EH.ED_HIST_SUB_CODE , EH.ED_HIST_DATE , EH.ED_HIST_COMMENT , EH.REG_ID FROM TB_EDOC_HIST EH JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (M.USER_ID = EH.USER_ID) WHERE ED_NO = #{edNo}
SELECT ED_NO , USER_ID , M.USER_NAME FROM TB_EDOC_REF ER JOIN TB_MEMBER M USING (USER_ID) WHERE ED_NO = #{edNo}

SELECT FILE_NO , FILE_PATH , FILESYSTEM_NAME , ORIGIN_NAME FROM TB_EDOC ED JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT AT ON (REF_CATEGORY = 'E' AND ED_NO = REF_NO) WHERE ED.DEL_YN = 'N' AND AT.DEL_YN = 'N' AND ED_NO = #{edNo}
